tag_list: international-affairs, consulting, marketing, international-relations, value, business-development, coo
overview: Jeremy Kobus is a foreign policy and business professional, he currently works at Pindrop Security, an Atlanta based financial technology startup. Previously, he was a Research Associate at the Advanced Technology Development Center, a business incubator, where he provided consulting and education to small and medium sized technology companies. Jeremy received his MBA from the Scheller College of Business at the Georgia Institute of Technology.
